title: Home Mortgage Disclosure Act Data
description:
Description
Cross-section data on the Home Mortgage Disclosure Act (HMDA).
reference:
Only includes variables used by Stock and Watson (2007), 
some of which had to be generated from the raw data.

parameters.insurance: Factor. Was the individual denied mortgage insurance?
parameters.hschool: Factor. Does the individual have a high-school diploma?
parameters.condomin: Factor. Is the unit a condominium?
parameters.unemp: 1989 Massachusetts unemployment rate in applicant's industry.

format: A data frame containing 2,380 observations on 14 variables.
